title: Canadian Conference for the Advancement of Surgical Education: Abstracts
abstract: # Intraoperative teaching styles: preferences of surgical residents {#article-title-2} There is variation in the way different surgeons teach in the operating room setting. Surgical residents in training may have preferences and opinions on how these teaching styles affect their learning. While
